questions.prompt: Do you enjoy participating in friendly debates?
Do you tend to accept the challenge of a dare from your friends?
Do you sometimes cry or choke up while watching a sad movie?
answers: Yes, you often cry during sad movies
No, you rarely cry during movies

questions.prompt: Is it important to you that you are liked by everyone?
If you felt someone had wronged you, you would:
answers: Quietly discuss the incident with the other person
Worry about it and keep it to yourself
Tell your friends about the incident, but likely not confront the person

questions.prompt: On one of those days when everything goes wrong, you most often:
answers: Complain to others about your bad day
Blame others for your bad day
Blame yourself for your bad day

questions.prompt: Are you very competitive?
When you make an error, do you regularly openly admit it?
You had arranged an outing, but your best friend called it off:
answers: You can surely find something else to do
You will try to do the same thing with someone else
Your whole day is completely ruined

questions.prompt: When you go to a social activity where you know only a few people, can you talk to people easily and are you generally at ease?
Generally speaking, would you consider yourself to be a neat person?
Are you usually calm in a crisis?
Can you take criticism without becoming angry?
Do you consider yourself a quiet person?
Do you worry about succeeding in your life?
Do weather conditions affect your mood?
For the most part, do you consider yourself:
answers: A live wire, full of fun and high spirits
Calm, cool, collected, and in control

questions.prompt: When you walk down the street, do you smile at people?
answers: No, you hardly look at people on the street

questions.prompt: Making a scene in public is:
answers: A perfect normal expression of unhappiness

questions.prompt: Who do you think are the happiest people?
answers: Those with a great deal of money
Those who give much to others
Those who have had many successes in life

questions.prompt: If you had a chance to have your fortune told for free, would you:
answers: Decline, you think it is nonsense
Accept, but not take it seriously
Accept, and heed the fortune teller's words

questions.prompt: Do you believe in the existence of UFOs?
Which is most important in a friendship?
Is giving to charities important to you?
You think $$$ is:
answers: Useful, but not of great importance when compared to other things

questions.prompt: Do you believe "absence makes the heart grow fonder"?
In terms of secrets, what do you believe?
answers: People who are really close should keep no secrets from each other
Sometimes it's okay to keep secrets from people you're close to
No matter how close, it's foolish to tell all your secrets

questions.prompt: Have you successfully broken at least one bad habit?
Are you usually on time for things?
Do you make it a habit to finish things that you start?
answers: No, you rarely ever finish things

questions.prompt: If you were not in a hurry in a store but you saw a person in line behind you who was, would you:
answers: Let that person go ahead of you
Hold your place and say nothing

questions.prompt: Are you happy when you are alone?
Do you have money saved for emergencies?
Your room is:
After school, you are generally:
answers: Occupied with some responsibilities, but have free time too
Taking it easy, it's nap time

questions.prompt: How often do you exercise?
Money should be:
answers: Spent on the necessities of life and saved
Spent on the necessities of life and occasionally on material items
Spent on fun, have a good time and enjoy life!

questions.prompt: Do you store and look back on old pictures, letters, and souvenirs?
Do you sing and/or play a musical instrument well?
Do you enjoy clubs and/or sports?
Running is:
answers: Excellent discipline for mind and body

questions.prompt: When you go to a sports event, do you:
answers: Talk to friends and forget the game
You've never gone to a sports event

questions.prompt: Before you go to a dance or social function, do you check with others to find out what they are wearing?
Do you prefer brand name products?
answers: No, advertising does not influence me

questions.prompt: Would you take the blame for a guilty loved one?
answers: No, you would never accept blame falsely

questions.prompt: Do you like when your friends tell you about all of their personal problems?
Are you willing to welcome the ideas of others, even if they differ from your own?
If you disliked a person, you would:
answers: Force yourself to find things to like about them
Be generally polite as a courtesy
Make your dislike painstakingly clear through words & actions

questions.prompt: A good friend borrows things, but often forgets to return them:
answers: Gently remind them to give your things back
Outright look for a new friend

questions.prompt: Do you laugh at jokes when you don't understand them?
Can you laugh at yourself when you make unimportant mistakes?
If you had the opportunity to study abroad for one year, would you do it?
answers: Yes, you'd jump at the opportunity

answers: Participating in clubs, band, choir, or sports
Watching sporting events, plays, or concerts
Spending time with friends in class or during lunch

questions.prompt: How much emphasis do you put on school?
answers: It's kind of important to me
It's not at all important to me

questions.prompt: Do you prefer to take classes that are mostly:
answers: You'd prefer not to take any classes at all
